name: Collisions (itch) (arosso17)
description:
This is a little platforming game I created using pygame.  Use the arrow keys to move side to side and the space bar to jump. 

The main feature that makes this game different from any other platformer is the background switches between black and white which changes what platforms you can jump on.

Two scores are saved for each level: one for the fastest finish and one for the fastest finish while getting all three coins. You can adjust the size of the window and the color of your player in the settings menu. Download the four files into a single folder and then run the main.py script to play the game. This is my first game so leave any comments, suggestions, or criticism below. I am still working on adding features and levels so there will be updates.
